AttributeType.name: op
AttributeType.dt:values: exist insert merge ensure replace delete

ElementType.name: Column
ElementType.description: Column definition for a Custom Table

ElementType.name: Data
ElementType.description: Data item for a row of a Custom Table

ElementType.name: Row
ElementType.description: Row data for a Custom Table

ElementType.name: CustomTable
ElementType.description: Provides definition of Custom Table

ElementType.name: IniFile
ElementType.description: Adds or removes .ini file entries

ElementType.name: ODBCDataSource
ElementType.description: ODBCDataSource for a Component

ElementType.name: ODBCDriver
ElementType.description: ODBCDriver for a Component

ElementType.name: ODBCTranslator
ElementType.description: ODBCTranslator for a Component

ElementType.name: FileSearch
ElementType.description: Searches for file and assigns to fullpath value of parent Property

ElementType.name: DirectorySearch
ElementType.description: Searches for directory and assigns to value of parent Property

ElementType.name: ComponentSearch
ElementType.description: Searches for file or directory and assigns to value of parent Property

ElementType.name: IniFileSearch
ElementType.description: Searches for file, directory or registry key and assigns to value of parent Property

ElementType.name: RegistrySearch
ElementType.description: Searches for file, directory or registry key and assigns to value of parent Property

ElementType.name: Property
ElementType.description: Property value for product

ElementType.name: Shortcut
ElementType.description: Shortcut, default target is parent File, CreateFolder, or Component's Directory

ElementType.name: Permission
ElementType.description: Sets ACLs on File, Registry, or CreateFolder

ElementType.name: CopyFile
ElementType.description: Causes a file to be duplicated, copied or moved to a new location

ElementType.name: Patch
ElementType.description: Patch information for parent File element

ElementType.name: File
ElementType.description: File specification for File table, must be child node of Component

ElementType.name: Registry
ElementType.description: Registry value for parent Component

ElementType.name: RemoveFile
ElementType.description: Files to remove from specied folder if parent Component is installed

ElementType.name: CreateFolder
ElementType.description: Create folder as part of parent Component

ElementType.name: Category
ElementType.description: Qualified published component for parent Feature Component

ElementType.name: MIME
ElementType.description: MIME content-type for an Extension

ElementType.name: Verb
ElementType.description: Verb definition for an Extension

ElementType.name: Extension
ElementType.description: Extension for Component

ElementType.name: TypeLib
ElementType.description: TypeLib registration for parent Component

ElementType.name: ProgId
ElementType.description: ProgId registration for parent Component

ElementType.name: AppId
ElementType.description: AppId registration, referenced by Class AppId attributes

ElementType.name: Class
ElementType.description: COM Class registration for parent Component

ElementType.name: ServiceDependency
ElementType.description: Service or group of services that are dependencies for services in ServiceInstall

ElementType.name: ServiceInstall
ElementType.description: Starts, stops, and removes services for parent Component

ElementType.name: ServiceArgument
ElementType.description: Argument used in ServiceControl parent

ElementType.name: ServiceControl
ElementType.description: Starts, stops, and removes services for parent Component

ElementType.name: Environment
ElementType.description: Environment variables added or removed for parent Component

ElementType.name: IsolateComponent
ElementType.description: Shared Component to be privately replicated in folder of parent Component

ElementType.name: ReserveCost
ElementType.description: Disk cost to reserve in a folder for running locally and/or from source

ElementType.name: Component
ElementType.description: Component for parent Directory

ElementType.name: Module
ElementType.description: Module to be redirected to parent directory

ElementType.name: Directory
ElementType.description: Folder for Directory table, must be child node of Directory or Product

ElementType.name: Upgrade
ElementType.description: Upgrade info for a particular UpgradeCode

ElementType.name: Feature
ElementType.description: Feature for Feature table, must be child node of Feature or Product

ElementType.name: PatchPackage
ElementType.description: PatchPackage found on parent Media element

ElementType.name: Media
ElementType.description: Media specification

ElementType.name: CustomAction
ElementType.description: Custom action specification

AttributeType.name: Execute
AttributeType.dt:values: immediate deferred rollback commit oncePerProcess firstSequence secondSequence

ElementType.name: Binary
ElementType.description: binary data used for CustomAction elements and UI controls

ElementType.name: Icon
ElementType.description: binary icon data used for Shortcut, ProgId, Class elements, not by UI controls

ElementType.name: Billboard
ElementType.description: Bilboard to display during install of a Feature

ElementType.name: BillboardAction
ElementType.description: Bilboard action during which child Billboards are displayed

ElementType.name: TextStyle
ElementType.description: TextStyle definition

ElementType.name: ListItem
ElementType.description: Text and value associated with Property with Control set to listBox,listView,comboBox

ElementType.name: ListBox
ElementType.description: Set of items for a particular ListBox control tied to an install Property

ElementType.name: ComboBox
ElementType.description: Set of items for a particular ComboBox control tied to an install Property

ElementType.name: ListView
ElementType.description: Set of items for a particular ListView control tied to an install Property

ElementType.name: RadioButton
ElementType.description: Text and value associated with Property with Control set to radioGroup

ElementType.name: RadioGroup
ElementType.description: Set of radio buttons tied to a particular install Property

ElementType.name: UIText
ElementType.description: Text associated with certain controls

ElementType.name: UI
ElementType.description: Enclosing tag to compartmentalize UI specifications

ElementType.name: Package
ElementType.description: Package attributes from SummaryInformation

AttributeType.name: Platforms
AttributeType.description: List of platforms supported in package

AttributeType.name: Languages
AttributeType.description: List of language IDs supported in package

AttributeType.name: SummaryCodepage
AttributeType.description: Codepage for summary info strings only
